attributes.action: Make it a criminal offense for an elected official to lie to their electorate.
attributes.additional_details:
I ask that the oath and contract for an elected official include three parts.

1) If caught irrefutably lying to their electorate they be subject to a personal fine of no less than £10,000.00

2) If that lie gives them any form of benefit through personal benefit through business interests outside of politics the accused should have to face a jail term of no less than 6 months.

3) If they must vote on anything that could potentially benefit them personally through business interests outside of politics that interest must be declared before such a vote takes place.
attributes.background: The word 'politician' has become synonymous with 'liar'.  This is unacceptable.  What once was a noble profession has become perverted with the ill intent of men and women who seek power and personal gain.
